releaseNotes:
1.1.0 Intital support for scenes (aka routines), proper rooms json fix.

1.0.5 Reduced log output, added MapWater parameter to appRoomClean.
1.0.4 & 1.0.3 Critical limit to refresh of homeData, auto refresh for older devices.
